name: Funny Shoot
description:
Funny shoot is a game where you shoot and it's funny. It's my first game and pretty rough, but we all start somewhere.

Defeat all the evil robots and get your reward at the end!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys
Space to Shoot
Shift, F, LeftAlt, RightAlt to Dash
Escape to exit

Reload the page to restart the game. Yes, that's a feature.
